San Francisco, CA, On Site, Full Time, http://www.butchershop.co/contact/,

Butchershop is a fully integrated creative agency in San Francisco, California. We are a jack of all trades, best of breed shop that focuses on the process of creating big ideas. We are problem solvers first and foremost and use our skills to create wonderful solutions for people, brands, and companies in a wide range of category and discipline.

We're looking for a technical lead to take charge of our growing front- and back-end developer teams. Collaborate with our creative strategy and design departments in creating engaging experiences for a variety of brands, organizations and start-up companies. Pitch, plan and manage implementation of dynamic, content-heavy marketing and ecommerce, websites and cloud based applications.
